database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - Large Pseudomonas v2
entry.description: mzXML's for LC-MS/MS of 256 different strains of Pseudomonas. Additionally, please see text document under "Methods and Protocols" regarding the Bruker Data Analysis, lockmass calibration, and mzXML conversion issue.
